body_html:
I'm not sure I understand the idea here -- you can now limit logging to see only, say, warning, errors, and fatals. With this new variable, you'd be able to restrict it to only show warnings, but not errors or fatals?

What's the use case for this?

body:
I'm not sure I understand the idea here -- you can now limit logging to see only, say, warning, errors, and fatals. With this new variable, you'd be able to restrict it to only show warnings, but not errors or fatals? 

What's the use case for this?
